paragraph1.head: About Traveller's Sanctuary
paragraph1.blurb1: Taxidermy DIY kogi vaporware, microdosing quinoa pabst seitan franzen chicharrones raw denim. Pinterest humblebrag small batch, you probably haven't heard of them disrupt bespoke green juice hashtag selfies shaman.
paragraph1.blurb2: Beard truffaut 8-bit taiyaki pitchfork trust fund unicorn. Pabst artisan keffiyeh direct trade mumblecore. Palo santo vexillologist lyft heirloom kale chips.

reviews.quote: The Sanctuary staff saw to our every need while we were in town. The whole team had an amazing stay. Could not recommend it more.
reviews.name: Jordan Rivers

reviews.quote: I always try to stay at the Sanctuary when I'm in town on business. Incrediblely dedicated staff and service. Highly recommended
reviews.name: Sara Ali

reviews.quote: Best place to stay if you are travelling to San Francisco. Make sure to book well in advance.
reviews.name: Coraline Zhu
